alert.note: Alert for Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 8:02AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MARION COUNTY THROUGH 830 AM EDT... At 802 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers capable of producing a landspout near Black Diamond, or near Beverly Hills, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dunnellon. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for northern Florida.
